query: 如图,△ABC为等边三角形,点E在BA的延长线上,点D在BC边上,且ED=EC．若△ABC的边长为4,AE=2,则BD的长为()选项：['2', '3', '√{3}', '√{3}+1']
answer: 解:延长BC至F点,使得CF=BD,∵ED=EC,∴∠EDC=∠ECD,∴∠EDB=∠ECF,在△EBD和△EFC中≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{DB=CF}\\{∠BDE=∠FCE}\\{DE=CE}\end{array}\right.∴△EBD≌△EFC(SAS),∴∠B=∠F∵△ABC是等边三角形,∴∠B=∠ACB,∴∠ACB=∠F,∴AC∥EF,∴\frac{BA}{AE}=\frac{BC}{CF},∵BA=BC,∴AE=CF=2,∴BD=AE=CF=2故选:A．
